Rangers: RHP Jacob deGrom (elbow surgery) retired all six batters he faced in his second rehab start for Triple-A Round Rock on Tuesday night.
White Sox: 3B Yoan Moncada (adductor strain) and RHP Michael Soroka (shoulder strain) were scheduled to begin rehab assignments with Triple-A Charlotte on Tuesday.
Texas rookie Jack Leiter is scheduled to make his fourth career start against fellow RHP Chris Flexen when the series continues Wednesday.
The game will be made up on Wednesday as part of a doubleheader, starting at 4:10 p.m.
The club added INF Jake Amaya to the active roster a day after claiming him off waivers from Houston and recalled RHP Prelander Berroa from Charlotte.
INF Bryan Ramos was optioned to Triple-A and RHP John Brebbia was designated for assignment.
